dmca.title: [ABUSE] bigdealtv.com-Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2006 11:25 AM
To: Jayme; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] bigdealtv.com-Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


Jayme wrote:
> 
> 
>  
> 
> * April 18, 2006 *
> 
> * SENT VIA Certified Mail
>   Return Receipt Requested *
> 
>         
> 
> * 7006 0100 0002 0690 0809 *
> 
>  
> 
> *   *
> 
> * Designated Agent *
> 
> * Theplanet.com *
> 
> *   *
> 
>  
> 
> */ Re:      Unauthorized Use of Sony Trademarks and/or Copyrighted
> Materials /*
> 
>  
> 
> Dear Designated Agent:
> 
>            
> 
> We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact 
> you with respect to unauthorized use of Sony?s trademarks and/or 
> copyrighted materials.
> 
>  
> 
> Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and 
> enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, 
> and other copyrighted materials.  Net Enforcers has in turn retained 
> us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
